t1.name: Vacuum Plasma Spray System
t1.description: The vacuum plasma spray system is a state-of-the-art thermal spray system that is capable of depositing a wide range of materials, including ceramics, metals, and composites.

t2.name: Bordeur Thermal Spray Coating System
t2.description: The Bordeur thermal spray coating system is a state-of-the-art thermal spray system that is capable of depositing a wide range of materials, including ceramics, metals, and composites.

t3.name: Thermal Spraying
t3.description: Thermal spraying is a coating process that uses a heat source to melt a material and propel it onto a substrate. The material is melted in the form of a powder, wire, or rod, and is then sprayed onto the substrate using a high-velocity gas stream. The material solidifies on the substrate to form a coating.
